thread.title: Toyota and Kobe Steel hit with U.S. lawsuit

title: Toyota and Kobe Steel hit with U.S. lawsuit
text:
Toyota and Kobe Steel hit with U.S. lawsuit Wednesday, March 07, 2018 - 01:11 
U.S. consumers have filed a lawsuit against Kobe Steel and Toyota, accusing the companies of violating consumer protection laws and engaging in fraud by concealing the use of substandard metal components in vehicles. Grace Lee reports.   
U.S. consumers have filed a lawsuit against Kobe Steel and Toyota, accusing the companies of violating consumer protection laws and engaging in fraud by concealing the use of substandard metal components in vehicles. Grace Lee reports.  //reut.rs/2oV3jLq
